---
title: "Monocle analysis"
author: "Eric Kernfeld"
date: "November 2, 2016"
output: html_document
---


```{r}
results_path = Sys.getenv( "FREEZR_DESTINATION" )
branch_markers = freezr::inventory( tag = "branch_markers" ) %>% read.table
for( my_cluster in unique( branch_markers$label ) ){
  geneset = subset( branch_markers, 
                    label==my_cluster, 
                    select = "gene", 
                    drop = T ) %>% as.character
  do_enrichr( results_path,
              geneset,
              geneset_name = paste0( "label=", my_cluster ),
              N_ANNOT_PER_DB = 5 )
  
}

```
